lead_paragraph: TOKYO, April 2 (From Japanese broadcasts recorded by The United Press in New York) -- It was officially announced here today that new and improved airfields in Lishui and Chuhsien, to which long-range American bombers had been sent from Java, were destroyed and that "the United Nations' dream of carrying out bombing raids on Japan from China was shattered."
abstract: Japanese bomb Lishui and Chuhsien airfields
